titleInfo.title: Lobby Card for "The White Cliffs of Dover"

mods.abstract: "The White Cliffs of Dover" begins with Susan Dunn (Irene Dunne) and her father, Hiram Porter Dunn (Frank Morgan), vacationing in England during World War I. Here, Susan meets and marries wealthy British aristocrat Sir John Ashwood (Alan Marshal). Sadly, Ashwood is killed on the battlefield, and Susan is left to raise their son, John Ashwood II (Roddy McDowall and Peter Lawford) alone. During World War II, the younger John Ashwood serves with the British army while Susan Ashwood works for the Red Cross. He is wounded in battle, and she is devastated to find her own son among the wounded soldiers that she cares for. She is unable to save his life, but consoles herself with the knowledge that both her husband and her son died for a noble cause.
